text.data-name: are you an author with a half-written manuscript, an entrepreneur or coach with some lessons to offer, a literary artist with a message worth sharing? We have the time and skill to take you to the launch!
text.tspan: are you an author with a half-written manuscript, an entrepreneur or coach with some lessons to offer, a literary artist with a message
worth sharing? We have the time and skill to take you to the launch!
